description: A.M.S.Thilakarathne Vs. Hon. Attorney General - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Court of appeal has no jurisdiction to entertain the appeals filed to challenge the decisions of the High Court Judges where they have exercised appellate powers.
parties: A.M.S.Thilakarathne Vs. Hon. Attorney General - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: Court of appeal has no jurisdiction to entertain the appeals filed to challenge the decisions of the High Court Judges where they have exercised appellate powers.
